articles.content: Spider-Man: No Way Home became the first film to surpass the US$1bil (RM4.1bil) milestones in global ticket sales during the Covid-19 pandemic, Xinhua news agency reported according to studio figures… [+974 chars]

articles.title: The CDC Shortened Quarantine Periods as Omicron Cases Soared - The New York Times
articles.description: Americans infected with the virus need to isolate only for five days, not 10, the agency said. Several states have reported more infections in the past week than in any other seven-day period.
articles.content: On Sunday, the seven-day national average of new daily cases surpassed 214,000, an 83 percent jump over the past 14 days. Deaths also increased by 3 percent to a seven-day average of 1,328, according… [+1385 chars]
